title: Spider-man
description:
Due to the lack of decent torrents of this great film, I thought I&#039;d post my own rip. Here&#039;s some info:

*Ripped on the Mac with HandBrake 0.7.1*
English
Widescreen

This rip looks and sounds great, will play with any player - though I always recommend VLC - and will fit on a single CDrom.

For anyone looking for a good "Spiderman 2" - there are a lot of crap, full screen, and foreign versions - I recommend: <a href="
